narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Allied Adult Day Care, LLC is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Owensboro, KY. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $14.0M in Medicaid payments across 12K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $14.0M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
